newsArray.title: Virat Kohli scripts history, becomes first-ever batter in the world to...
newsArray.description: Star Indian cricketer Virat Kohli etched his name in IPL history on Thursday (April 10) by becoming the first-ever player to smash 1000 boundaries in the prestigious T20 league.

newsArray.title: 'It's Going To Take...': Michael Clarke Backs 'Absolute Superstar' Rohit Sharma To Shine In IPL 2025
newsArray.description: In four IPL 2025 matches played so far for the Mumbai Indians, Rohit Sharma has only managed to score 38 runs. He will next take the field for the Hardik Pandya-led side on Sunday in Delhi.

newsArray.title: Ambati Rayudu backs MS Dhoni to turn things around for Chennai Super Kings after being named captain
newsArray.description: In a major decision, it was announced that MS Dhoni will be leading Chennai Super Kings for the remainder of the IPL (Indian Premier League) 2025, as Ruturaj Gaikwad has been ruled out of the tournament due to an elbow fracture. With Dhoni back at the helm, many fans are excited about what the future holds for CSK in the IPL 2025.

newsArray.title: RCB vs DC, TATA IPL 2025 24th Match 1st Inning Scorecard: रॉयल चैलेंजर्स बेंगलुरु ने दिल्ली कैपिटल्स को दिया 164 रनों का टारगेट, टिम डेविड और फिलिप साल्ट ने खेली धुआंधार पारी; यहां देखें पहली पारी का स्कोरकार्ड
newsArray.description: इंडियन प्रीमियर लीग 2025 का 24वां मुकाबला आज यानी 10 अप्रैल को रॉयल चैलेंजर्स बेंगलुरु बनाम दिल्ली कैपिटल्स के बीच खेला जा रहा हैं. दोनों टीमों के बीच यह मुकाबला बेंगलुरु के एम चिन्नास्वामी स्टेडियम में खेला जा रहा हैं.
newsArray.sentiment: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.sentiment_stats: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: IPL 2025 : વિરાટ કોહલીએ બનાવ્યો મોટો રેકોર્ડ, IPLમાં 1000 છગ્ગા-ચોગ્ગા ફટકારીને રચ્યો ઈતિહાસ
creator: Smit Chauhan
newsArray.description: દિલ્હી કેપિટલ્સ સામેની મેચમાં વિરાટ કોહલીએ પાવરપ્લેમાં આવતાની સાથે જ એક ફોર અને એક સિક્સર ફટકારી હતી. આ બે બાઉન્ડ્રી સાથે, વિરાટ કોહલીએ IPLમાં આ મોટી સિદ્ધિ હાંસલ કરી હતી. કોહલી IPLમાં 1000 બાઉન્ડ્રી ફટકારનાર પહેલો ખેલાડી બન્યો હતો.
newsArray.sentiment: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.sentiment_stats: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: RCB vs DC : आरसीबी घरच्या मैदानात मोठी धावसंख्या करण्यात अपयशी, दिल्लीसमोर 164 रन्सचं टार्गेट, कोण जिंकणार?
creator: sanjay patil
newsArray.description: Royal Challengers Bengaluru vs Delhi Capitals Ipl 2025 : रॉयल चॅलेंजर्स बंगळुरुला शानदार सुरुवात मिळाली होती. मात्र दिल्ली कॅपिट्ल्सच्या गोलंदाजांनी आरसीबीला ठराविक अंतराने झटके दिले. त्यामुळे आरसीबीला घरच्या मैदानात मोठी खेळी करता आली नाही.
newsArray.sentiment: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

creator: The Associated Press
newsArray.description: CHENNAI, India (AP) — Chennai Super Kings captain Ruturaj Gaikwad is out for the rest of the Indian Premier League with an elbow injury and veteran Mahendra Singh Dhoni will now lead the side.
